column4: on 8.10 - with no xorg.conf - How do I enable twinview - Whenever I reboot it resets
Ubuntu 8.10 uses the xorg.conf if you have one.
hrm, if I use X -configure to generate one, will I be able to enable nvidia via the gui? I really don't feel like figuring video card drivers out today
If you get X running, you should be able to install it with the GUI, yes. Seems to be a bit buggy for some nvidia cards right now, though.
